original_text:
**INSTITUTION
CRITICAL CARE MEDICINE
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN PROGRESS NOTE
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
**NAME[YYY M ZZZ]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Nov 19 2007]
EVALUATION DATE :
**DATE[Jan 02 08]
**INSTITUTION VISIT
Mr. **NAME[AAA] has done well overnight .
He is without complaints this morning .
On examination , he is afebrile .
Vital signs are stable .
He is breathing comfortably at 12 - 14 times a minute .
Oxygen saturations are good on 6 liters nasal - cannula .
Chest is clear .
Abdomen is soft .
Extremities are warm .
Laboratory examination is unremarkable .
BUN and creatinine are stable .
In 's and out 's were overall net positive .
Urine output has been adequate .
Today , I am weaning off his blood pressure medications .
I am weaning down his oxygen and I have ordered a C. difficile toxin in light of a little bit of diarrhea that he has continued to complain of .
He should be stable for transfer to the floor today .
I have discussed his case with the general surgeons who will be assuming his care .
___________________________________
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
Dictator :
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
**INITIALS
D :
**DATE[Jan 02 2008] 18:41:00
T :
**DATE[Jan 02 2008] 19:19:17
R :
**DATE[Jan 02 2008] 19:19:17/ncm
Job ID :
411382 /**ID-NUM
CC:
*** Dictated By :
-**NAME[XXX , SSS M]. ***
Electronically Signed by **NAME[WWW XXX]
**DATE[Jan 19 2008] 02:55:29 PM
